reviewText: What a disappointment.  REally pitched at the level of an infomercial.  I'm surprised he didn't get Billy Mays to be the front guy for it.  All the depth of a plate of water.  Covey, family and crew have stopped thinking and trying to add value.  Just milking the old material.  Save your money.
This is such a great video - I got so much out of it (I am a teacher) and I believe it works for business, relationship - any area of life where you want to realize your dreams.

If you enjoyed the "7 Habits of Successful People", you will love this video!  Dr. Covey talks about "life balance" in an easy to understand way, and gets you motivated to work towards your life goals.
